import sys

test_cases = int(sys.stdin.readline())
while test_cases > 0:
    test_cases -= 1
    no_of_votes = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    votes = dict()
    for i in range(0, no_of_votes):
        a,b = sys.stdin.readline().split()
        votes[a] = b
    count = 0
    for i in votes:
        if votes[i] == '+':count += 1
        else: count -= 1
    print count
